name: SlimeEvo
description:
In SlimeEvo you are slime that wants to destroy humanity you have a lot of diffrent paths to chose every one gives difrents stats.I wasnt able to finish everything that I wanted. I was exhausted from 2 previous games that I didnt finish and wanted to finish at least something, but I really like idea of this game and I want to finish it.

Important - You have to play in fullscreen (idk what I did).

Controls:

- W A S D - move

- Mouse - shoot

- Pallete - https://lospec.com/palette-list/slimy-05
